title: Update service galleries: remove Full Interior Fit-outs images and add Carpet Installation images

requirements.summary: Remove all 'Full Interior Fit-outs' gallery items so the Services page shows the MediaStrip empty-gallery placeholder for that service.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts` no longer contains any `GalleryItem` entries with `category: 'full-interior'`.
On the Services page, the 'Full Interior Fit-outs' service section renders the empty-gallery placeholder block from `MediaStrip` (no thumbnails).

file_operations.description: Delete the existing `GalleryItem` entries for the 'Full Interior Fit-outs' section by removing all items with `category: 'full-interior'`, ensuring `MediaStrip` receives an empty list and renders its placeholder.

requirements.summary: Add 6 uploaded carpet images as static assets and register them as gallery media items under a new carpet gallery category.
acceptanceCriteria: All 6 uploaded image files are present under `frontend/public/assets/` (preserve filenames exactly, including spaces and punctuation).

`frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts` includes 6 new `GalleryItem` entries (type `image`) that reference the new assets via `path: 'assets/<filename>'` and share a single, consistent category string for carpet (e.g., `carpet-installation`).
No existing gallery categories are broken (other service galleries still load their images).

Append 6 new `GalleryItem` entries of type `image` for a single new carpet category (use one consistent category string, e.g. `carpet-installation`). Each item should reference the new static assets using `path: 'assets/<filename>'` with exact filenames (including spaces/punctuation where applicable).

requirements.summary: Render a MediaStrip of the carpet gallery inside the 'Carpet Installation' additional offering only.
acceptanceCriteria: The 'Additional Offerings' card for 'Carpet Installation' shows a `MediaStrip` directly within/under the offering content, rendering up to 4 thumbnails (consistent with current `MediaStrip` default behavior).
Other additional offerings (Roller Blinds, Vertical Blinds, Parquet Flooring) remain unchanged and do not show a media strip.
No console errors occur due to missing categories/paths when visiting the Services page.

file_operations.description: Extend the `additionalOfferings` content to include an optional field (e.g., `mediaCategory`) on the 'Carpet Installation' item only, set to the same carpet category string used in `frontend/src/content/galleryMedia.ts` (e.g. `carpet-installation`). Leave other offerings unchanged (no media category).

Import and render the existing `MediaStrip` component within/under the 'Carpet Installation' additional offering only (conditionally based on the new optional offering field), passing the carpet gallery category so the offering displays up to 4 thumbnails by default. Ensure other offerings render exactly as before without a media strip.
